title: Blended Learning-Based Science Competency Enhancement Program Using an Adaptive E-Learning Platform

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized science education program for pre-service elementary educators and job-seeking education majors, operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments with project-based assessments to measure learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze implicit information in scientific texts using an adaptive e-learning platform.

Learners engage in a blended learning environment for six months, combining two weekly offline activities (experiments/discussions) and three online modules (video lectures, quizzes), and submit a self-directed learning plan and progress report (achieving â‰¥80% completion) weekly via a Learning Management System (LMS).
Learners diagnose individual learning gaps and establish supplementary plans through a Rasch model-based assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
